Designed for the modern, active workstation, Infinity is a new LED task light from Humanscale that responds to evolving tasks and needs. This 2017 Red Dot Product Design winner offers exceptional flexibility and high quality, energy-efficient light. Its constant torque ‘Forever Hinge’ allows for seamless adjustment, so the user
can easily re-position the light to accommodate varying needs and comfort levels throughout the day. These innovative new hinges promise to withstand frequent use and maintain their secure positioning over time.

Infinity uses large-array, multi chip LEDs to achieve 1500 lux illumination that casts just a single shadow. It is composed of 90% highly recyclable aluminum, and because the light’s exterior color is created by color films (rather than paint) the manufacturing process to create unique colors remains streamlined, and
therefore more energy efficient. Rated for 50,000 hours and featuring cool chip performance, Infinity provides the ideal task light output that’s powerful yet eco-friendly. Additional user-friendly features include a nightlight mode and a PIR sensor to conserve energy. User control indicator lights fade after adjustment to reduce visual
clutter. Offering an infinite number of adjustments and the latest LED technology, Infinity is designed for long-term performance.
